item.name: Get Payment Transaction Of a Load

query.description: it will pick loads with assigned status but driver must have accepted admin invite against that load
assigned to that driver and on the way to delivery route
it is delivered to the customer

            <wsu:Created>2023-02-06T15:38:52.618Z</wsu:Created>
         </wsse:UsernameToken>
      </wsse:Security>
   </soapenv:Header>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <cow:loadMoney>
         <loadRequest>
            <!--type: dateTime-->
            <availableDateTime>2023-02-13T00:00:00</availableDateTime>

            <!--type: string-->

            <!--type: string-->

            <!--type: string-->

            <!--type: long-->
            <trackingNumber>4</trackingNumber>
            <!--type: double-->
            <loadAmount>10.99</loadAmount>
            <!--type: boolean-->
            <directDeposit>0</directDeposit>
         </loadRequest>
      </cow:loadMoney>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>
